      • newDomainSocketWatcher

        private DomainSocketWatcher newDomainSocketWatcher(int interruptCheckPeriodMs)
                                            throws Exception
        Creates a new DomainSocketWatcher and tracks its thread for termination due to an unexpected exception. At the end of each test, if there was an unexpected exception, then that exception is thrown to force a failure of the test.
        Parameters:
        interruptCheckPeriodMs - interrupt check period passed to DomainSocketWatcher
        Returns:
        new DomainSocketWatcher
        Throws:
        Exception - if there is any failure
